column1: # ZAP Tuning Rules for TopSteel ERP

column5: # Ignore certain auth bypass checks in development
# SQL Injection - fail on all instances
# Cross Site Scripting (Reflected) - fail on all
# Cross Site Scripting (Persistent) - fail on all
# Cross Site Scripting (Persistent) - Prime - fail on all
# Absence of Anti-CSRF Tokens - fail on all
# Secure Pages Include Mixed HTTP Content - info only
# Code Injection - fail on API endpoints
# Command Injection - fail on API endpoints
# Storable but Non-Cacheable Content - info only
